full_summary:
_____________
# Tabusintac Gully Channel Dredging
_____________
## Project Overview

The Government of Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the Tabusintac Gully Channel Dredging project. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing all necessary labour and equipment to perform dredging and ocean disposal of dredged materials at Tabusintac Gully, located in New Brunswick.

### Key Information

* **Tender Reference:** WS4387082899
* **Publication Date:** January 11, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 26, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Project Location:** Tabusintac Gully, New Brunswick
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 2, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A

### Project Scope

The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:

* Provision of labour and equipment for dredging and ocean disposal of dredged materials
* Compliance with all relevant regulations and standards

### Proposal Guidelines

* All technical and contractual inquiries should be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority at richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Trade Agreements

This project falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## How to Submit a Proposal

To submit a proposal, contractors must visit the following website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18491326?extsite=MTg0OTEzMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18491326?extsite=MTg0OTEzMjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact Information

For any technical or contractual inquiries, please contact:

* Richard Parsons (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
